Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the incident did not happen at Keppel Shipyard in Singapore.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the scale of the incident by using the term "mass brawl" when it was a fight involving a specific group of workers.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading video and does not provide any evidence or sources to verify the location or context of the incident.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the incident occurred at Keppel Shipyard in Singapore without any factual basis.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation provided by the expert that the incident actually took place at a gas processing plant in Russia.
